source:
SELECT 
  family,
  ('child' || child) AS child,
  (CASE child 
    WHEN 1 THEN dob_child1 
    WHEN 2 THEN dob_child2 
    WHEN 3 THEN dob_child3 
   END) AS dob,
  (CASE child 
    WHEN 1 THEN height_child1 
    WHEN 2 THEN height_child2 
    WHEN 3 THEN height_child3 
   END) AS height
FROM 
  families
  CROSS JOIN
  (SELECT 1 as child UNION VALUES (2), (3))
author: will
